metadata.title: CVE-2019-19637 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libsixel 1.8.2. There is an integer overflow in the function sixel_decode_raw_impl at fromsixel.c.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.6-1').
